Name: Figurine of Min-Amun
Description: This small statuette in bronze, which is characterised by many traces of wear and tear, depicts Min-Amun. The god of the town of Akhmim is depicted standing, the right arm raised at right angles. The royal whip hangs loose from the open hand. The left arm is found under a fine skintight vest and the hand surrounds the divine phallus. On his head shines a crown composed of two high feathers and a solar disk.
